text: To Catch a Killer is a television movie from 1992. It was directed by Eric Till, and starred Brian Dennehy and Michael Riley. The movie is based on the true story of the pursuit of American serial killer John Wayne Gacy. ==References== ==Other websites== * To Catch a Killer at IMDb Category:1992 crime movies Category:1990s serial killer movies Category:American serial killer movies Category:American television movies Category:Antisocial personality disorder in fiction Category:English-language movies Category:Movies based on real life events
title: To Catch a Killer
